comprehensive_overview: ucx-cuda is a CUDA-enabled version of the Unified Communication X (UCX) framework, designed to provide high-performance communication primitives for parallel programming models on NVIDIA GPUs.
core_features: Optimized communication primitives for parallel programming on NVIDIA GPUs
Support for CUDA-aware MPI and other communication libraries
Enhanced performance and scalability for GPU-accelerated applications
Integration with various programming models like MPI, OpenSHMEM, and PGAS languages
